## resonant() function

Add resonance to a plain object. All object properties will be eligible dependencies for an effect.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function resonant<T extends Record<any, any>>(target: T): T;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  target | T |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

T
